components.description: Enclosing container for the components in the system.

component.description: List of components, keyed by component name.

name.description: Device name for the component -- this will not be a configurable parameter on many implementations

admin-state.description: Set the admin state of the component

vendor-type.description: Device model type for the component, defined by the supplier. Where component preconfiguration is supported, for example, the component name may be configurable.

led.description: The alarm led state on the front panel of the card.

type.description: Type of component as identified by the system

id.description: Unique identifier assigned by the system for the component

location.description: System-supplied description of the location of the component within the system. This could be a bay position, slot number, socket location, etc. For component types that have an explicit slot-id attribute, such as linecards, the system should populate the more specific slot-id.

mfg-name.description: System-supplied identifier for the manufacturer of the component. This data is particularly useful when a component manufacturer is different than the overall device vendor.

mfg-date.description: The manufacturer date of the component.

hardware-version.description: For hardware components, this is the hardware revision of the component.

firmware-version.description: For hardware components, this is the version of associated firmware that is running on the component, if applicable.

software-version.description: For software components such as operating system or other software module, this is the version of the currently running software.

serial-no.description: System-assigned serial number of the component.

part-no.description: System-assigned part number for the component. This should be present in particular if the component is also an FRU (field replacable unit)

removable.description: If true, this component is removable or is a field replaceable unit

oper-status.description: If applicable, this reports the current operational status of the component.

memory.description: For components that have associated memory, these values report information about available and utilized memory.

available.description: The available memory physically installed, or logically allocated to the component.

utilized.description: The memory currently in use by processes running on the component, not considering reserved memory that is not available for use.

allocated-power.description: Power allocated by the system for the component.

used-power.description: Actual power used by the component.

empty.description: Mark if the compoent is online.

equipment-failure.description: If true, the hardware indicates that the component's physical equipment has failed.

equipment-mismatch.description: If true, the hardware indicates that the component inserted into the affected component's physical location is of a different type than what is configured.

name.description: Reference to the name of the subcomponent

redundant-state.description: Identifier for redundant state of control card.

name.description: Reference to the name of the subcomponent

linecards_schema.description: Operational state data for linecard components.

name.description: Device name for the component

power-admin-state.description: Enable or disable power to the linecard

slot-id.description: Identifier for the slot or chassis position in which the linecard is installed

memory-capacity.description: The memory capability of the component.

min-input-voltage.description: The minimum value of the input voltage.

max-input-voltage.description: The maximum value of the input voltage.

min-input-current.description: The minimum value of the input current.

max-input-current.description: The maximum value of the input current.

min-temperature.description: The minimum value of the temperature.

max-temperature.description: The maximum value of the temperature.

supported-card-types.description: Enclosing container for supported card type.

card-class.description: Linecard name defined by the model.

items.description: Supported card type for the linecard.

power-admin-state.description:
Set admin state of the linecard.
When the value changes, a notification is required.

card-type-preconf.description:
The expected card type.
When the value changes, a notification is required.
